name: Neon Vector Shooter
description:
Spawn in the middle of nowhere and enemies will appear around you. And guess what, you shoot em down! The difficulty will gradually increase the longer you survive. Your score also increases faster the longer you survive.

Also, this is the first time that I have ever finished a project which makes me happy :) 

Here are the links to where I got my assets:
> Art: https://cdn.tutsplus.com/gamedev/uploads/2013/09/ShapeBlaster_AllParts.zip?_ga=2...
> Music: https://gooseninja.itch.io/space-music-pack
> Font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Nova+Square?preview.text_type=custom
